page.title: 14ST MARY'S CHURCH PRESTWICH
page.content:
It is almost certain that a place of worship has stood where the Parish Church now stands for over 800 years.There are many unusual features in this{15th. century Church.
In the Hilton Chapel there is a stained glass window which shows the Wedding Feast at Cana, but the strange thing about it is that the table is set as it would be in 1985 with knives and forks.
During the{Civil War,}Cromwell's men stormed the Church to prevent services being held there, and the lead shot they fired at the old wooden door can still be seen embedded there.
